bike.description: Specialized 100% Cr-Mo, double-butted HT/DT, externally relieved HT, disc mount, 6mm offset horizontal drop out for 26" wheel w/ replaceable 98954020 alloy hanger, disc only

Specialized/Alex HRD 26, double wall disc w/ eyelets
